sentence.Network_en: Furthermore, as Gervaise was quick to point out, Mr Scully was not a detective.
sentence.Network_cn: 而且，正如热尔韦斯毫不犹豫地指出来的那样，斯库利先生并不是一名侦探。

sentence.Network_en: I don't like her because she is too tall and furthermore she smokes too much.
sentence.Network_cn: 我不喜欢她,因为她太高,另外她抽烟太厉害.

sentence.Network_en: I don't want to go there, furthermore, I have no time to do so.
sentence.Network_cn: 我不想去那里, 而且我也没时间去.

entry.def: Furthermore is used to introduce a piece of information or opinion that adds to or supports the previous one.

example.ex: Furthermore, they claim that any such interference is completely ineffective.
example.tran: 此外，他们还声称任何这样的干预都是完全无效的。

sentences.sentence: "computer chess games are getting cheaper all the time; furthermore, their quality is improving"
"the cellar was dark; moreover, mice nested there"
"what is more, there's no sign of a change"
